titles.title: A bill to amend the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to permit participating households to use food stamp benefits to purchase nutritional supplements providing vitamins or minerals, and for other purposes.
Food Stamp Vitamin and Mineral Improvement Act of 2007
Food Stamp Vitamin and Mineral Improvement Act of 2007

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary: Food Stamp Vitamin and Mineral Improvement Act of 2007 - Amends the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to permit food stamp program purchases of nutritional supplements providing a vitamin or mineral, or both.
